title: In Nigeria, a Catholic Bishop Tries to Tone Down the Uproar After U.S. Missile Strikes
summary_full: Bishop Matthew Hassan Kukah, often called “the conscience of the nation,” has been trying to tone down the uproar after President Trump bombed a region in his diocese.
summary_public: Bishop Matthew Hassan Kukah, often called “the conscience of the nation,” has been trying to tone down the uproar after President Trump bombed a region in his diocese.
